text: Prime Video app version 6.12.1 crashes immediately on Echo Show running iOS 17. Error code error 404 displays before crash.
Black screen after firmware update suggests display driver issue. Try factory reset Fire Stick to previous firmware version 4.1.0.
Alexa app won't sync with Echo Dot 4th generation. Device firmware 3.8.7, smartphone OS Windows 11. Connection times out.
Kindle app freeze indicates insufficient RAM. Force quit app, clear all cached data, disable background apps, then restart device.
Fire Stick outputs black screen after latest firmware update to version 1.3.8. Audio works but no video display.
Let's troubleshoot that crash. First, uninstall app completely, reboot Samsung Galaxy, then reinstall from app store. Check OS compatibility.
Kindle app freezes on loading screen. Fire Tablet 10 HD with 2GB RAM, 64GB storage. Cleared cache twice, still unresponsive.
That's a sync issue. Try factory reset on Echo Dot, then re-pair in Alexa app. Ensure both devices on same WiFi network SSID.
Prime Video app version 6.12.1 crashes immediately on Fire TV running Fire OS 7.2. Error code timeout error displays before crash.
